confirm.title: Confirm installation
confirm.description: Do you want to install the GE Appliances integration?

abort.already_configured: The appliance you are attempting to set up is already connected to Home Assistant.
abort.not_supported: Configuration for GE Appliances is through MQTT discovery. Please connect your MQTT adapter to your appliance.
abort.invalid_discovery_info: A GE Appliance was found, but the configuration information was invalid. Please check your MQTT adapter and try again.
